result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact or Sexual Intercourse w/ Person under Age of 13
Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sara Christina Koch

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:47 PM Defendant Sara Christina Koch appeared by video.  Attorney Corey Mehlos appeared by video for Sara Christina Koch.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested by zoom and within time limits.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 866905,
Payable Number: 277110,
Receipt Number: 22R 034080,
Amount: $20.00
Adjourned initial appearance on October 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
No contact directly or indirectly with victim L.K., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with any minors at all. Must remain in residence between 7 PM and 7 AM.

3:25 PM Defendant Sara Christina Koch appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Refugio Cuco Longoria appeared by video for Sara Christina Koch.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant address and date of birth verified. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Signature bond set of $5,000 with conditions. No contact directly or indirectly with victim L.K., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with any minors at all. Must remain in residence between 7 PM and 7 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
